price: او الله به هيڅكله يو څوک وروسته نه كړي، كله يې چې اجل راشي او الله ستاسي په كړنو ښه خبر دی.
arabic: وَلَن يُؤَخِّرَ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهَاۚ وَٱللَّهُ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walan yu-akhira al-lahu nafsan idhā jāa ajaluhā wal-lahu khabīrun bimā taʿmalūna
